codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.description: Our community guidelines and ethical standards
codeOfConduct.respectful: Be respectful and inclusive in all interactions
codeOfConduct.harassment: No harassment or discrimination of any kind
codeOfConduct.truthful: Share truthful information and avoid spreading misinformation
codeOfConduct.constructive: Engage in constructive criticism and dialogue
codeOfConduct.hate: Hate speech and content that promotes violence or discrimination
codeOfConduct.enforcementDesc: Violation of these guidelines may result in content removal, account warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent banning depending on the severity and frequency of violations.
codeOfConduct.agree: I agree to follow the Code of Conduct

moderation.title: Community Moderation
moderation.newActionDesc: Take moderation action against a user who has violated community guidelines
moderation.reasonPlaceholder: Please provide a clear reason for this action
moderation.public: Make this action visible in the public log
